title: wanderer89
author: wanderer89
content: Hi,We operate one of the first and leading crypto prop-trade platform, powered by a top-tier CEX.Consider what we provide as a game where users pay to trade demo crypto trading accounts and earn rewards in real funding once they pass the challenge.This is a proven business model that has been emerging for forex and stock trading (with multiple platforms having +100mUSD ARR), as we are building to become the pioneer in this segment for crypto trading.We are working on our seed fundraising round and are looking for private investors. A few things about us:- Team has been working on the project for over a year.- Platform is operational with over 1k+ registered users.- Have some revenue (not significant) and growing.- Partnered with a top-tier CEX.Minimum ticket size of $100k. This is an equity round but can also be converted to SAFT depending on the discussion with the investors.
